definition: to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage

sentences.english: In this paper, the scenarios for the future development of spacedebris and collision probabilities are derived.
sentences.chinese: 文內推演了空間碎片未來發展的情況和碰撞概率。

sentences.english: As time goes on, the history proved that Chiung-Ming Cheng's choice was correct.
sentences.chinese: 歷史腳步的推演，證明了鄭炯明的選擇是正確的。

sentences.english: How in the world did you deduce that?

sentences.english: It is our sincere expect about what we have deduced can focus on the issue of historical conservation and reuse.

sentences.english: By coincidence or design, they are moderated extrapolations of current trends.

sentences.english: The Diary of Mrs. Shafei is a text under the virile logic.

sentences.english: Lamarck made an intuitive guess about the biosphere and again was prescient.
sentences.chinese: 拉馬克憑直覺推演生物圈，而且具有先見之明。

sentences.english: Geometry is developed rigorously from a postulational base.
sentences.chinese: 從公設的基礎上嚴謹地推演幾何學。
